br.com.henriquewilhelm.orbit

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.henriquewilhelm.orbit.Position

  • public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
    The Position class gathers the position of one element of the solar system (Sun, Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto) The calculations are:

    Position (rightAscention, declination, longitudeEcliptic and distance)

    Version:
    v2.0.0
    Author:
    Henrique Wilhelm v2.0.0, zoglmannk v1.0.0
